review:
****** ******* ** *** **** ******* * **** **** **** She is so friendly. Her smile is so contagious. Her way of explaining is very much impressive. I have experienced a root canal treatment with other dentist. It was so painful. She didn't even care about it. I have the pain on that tooth even today. 
But I have a totally different experience with Doctor Shaista. I didn't feel much pain and I could eat with the tooth the very day I had the treatment. It's really wonderful. Amazing experience. I would like to suggest everyone around to come and give a try. You will understand only if you experience. I highly recommend this loving passionate doctor. Thank you Doctor Shaista. God bless you üòá

*** ****** *** ****** ***** I took my 76year old mother with a tooth ache. Dr was really nice and thorough. She had to pull out a couple of my mother's teeth out and obe of them was in a really bad shape. Dr was very careful and patient while pulling out the teeth. I will recommend Dr Shaista to everyone.

First Thanks a lot to Dr Shaista for my treatment. She is a well experienced doctor. She will explain you what is your problem and also will explain the remedy of your  problem thoroughly.  After the confirmation from the patient, she will move forward for the treatment. She is friendly and have good patience to answer your all queries. I will always like  to  recommend anyone to Dr Shaista.

review:
The doctor explained the issue in a simple and clear manner. She made me feel calm during the procedure and adviced me the things required for my better oral hygiene.
I highly feel the scaling cost could have been on the lower side. 
But overall experience was good. I would recommend the doctor for her behavior, ********* and experience.
